line.comment: * Wait for starting options to be answered.
* Also wait for full generation of the galaxy.
* ZH 1.9 - Hull regeneration on all Boron ships
* ZH 1.8 - always keep player neutral to trading stations
* only if we don't have the blueprint yet
* neutral corporations long range resource distribution
* always try to instantly update 1 completely random ship type (requires port scan by player)
* then apply planned updates. The table contains keys of ship types with their individual update time.

line.text: 'DEBUG: check for player sector nation goal / has: '
'DEBUG: check for player money nation goal / has: '

line.comment: * during Xenon Crisis Protectorates cannot expire
* ZH 1.7: immediately remove protectorates from Xenon sectors during a crisis
* ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
* strong Rearguards become OCV hunters, their strength gets checked every 30 min
* ZH 1.7: use this occasion to fix messed up sector ownership (destroy all Xenon stations in sectors with faction stations)
* Base AI refreshes every 8h with the very performant (slow) ZH.Core script
* refresh players 'non-aggression pacts' (only the ones he has manually agreed)
* ** ZH 1.8 - from now on player Pacts get handled directly by the truce expiration code in Mayhem.Monitor.Galaxy
* pact is not over yet: prolong the truce
* player broke or honored his pact
* 1.8 coalition maintenance (only when player is involved)
* refresh the pact which refreshes truces
* all Task Forces should have a TM leader
* restart squadron if no new leader could be selected
* Truces refresh because both partners still want peace
* no member is allowed to retreat. Rally gate variable should already prevent Retreat sector variable, but sometimes it doesn't work.
* if leaders end up retreating somehow we stop the retreat and restart them
* safety checks during the positioning phase (ZH.CI.GoCode triggers the invasion)
* REMOVED only squadron leaders can be CI members, we remove any others here
* members without rally gate could block the entire operation so we also remove them
* crawling speed is not good if everyone has to wait on you
* are all our followers still proper CI members?
* do we already own the sector? (safety check)
* we have CI members but no target? (safety check)
* make sure that all Battlegroup leaders in the target sector are registered members and have the correct variables
* 25 hours - neutral corp trading stations share some resources with TIS
* 15 min - adapt pirate respawn speed to current population
* 10 hours - spawn a new pirate base
* reduced timer when there are few bases. Except when there is only 1 base left because it would be too frustrating to find in time.
* then tries to build new Nomad ships every 1-4 hours

then apply planned updates. The table contains keys of ship types with their individual update time.

ongoing Coordinated Invasions prevent the sector claim from expiring
strong Rearguards become OCV hunters, their strength gets checked every 30 min
ZH 1.7: use this occasion to fix messed up sector ownership (destroy all Xenon stations in sectors with faction stations)
Base AI refreshes every 8h with the very performant (slow) ZH.Core script
refresh players 'non-aggression pacts' (only the ones he has manually agreed)
** ZH 1.8 - from now on player Pacts get handled directly by the truce expiration code in Mayhem.Monitor.Galaxy
pact is not over yet: prolong the truce
player broke or honored his pact
1.8 coalition maintenance (only when player is involved)
refresh the pact which refreshes truces
all Task Forces should have a TM leader
restart squadron if no new leader could be selected
Truces refresh because both partners still want peace
no member is allowed to retreat. Rally gate variable should already prevent Retreat sector variable, but sometimes it doesn't work.
if leaders end up retreating somehow we stop the retreat and restart them
safety checks during the positioning phase (ZH.CI.GoCode triggers the invasion)
REMOVED only squadron leaders can be CI members, we remove any others here
members without rally gate could block the entire operation so we also remove them
crawling speed is not good if everyone has to wait on you
are all our followers still proper CI members?
do we already own the sector? (safety check)
we have CI members but no target? (safety check)
make sure that all Battlegroup leaders in the target sector are registered members and have the correct variables
25 hours - neutral corp trading stations share some resources with TIS
15 min - adapt pirate respawn speed to current population
10 hours - spawn a new pirate base
reduced timer when there are few bases. Except when there is only 1 base left because it would be too frustrating to find in time.
then tries to build new Nomad ships every 1-4 hours
